## WorkspaceSvg.getDragTarget() method

Returns the drag target the pointer event is over.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDragTarget(e: PointerEvent): IDragTarget | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | PointerEvent | Pointer move event. |

**Returns:**

[IDragTarget](./blockly.idragtarget.md) \| null

Null if not over a drag target, or the drag target the event is over.
